caption.p: XRD patterns and crystal/local structure descriptions of K 3LuSi 2O 7:Eu. a Simulated and measured XRD patterns of K 3LuSi 2O 7 and K 3LuSi 2O 7: xEu 2+ ( x = 0.01–0.05). b Rietveld refinement and c crystal structure of K 3LuSi 2O 7. d Cell volume V( x) dependence of the Eu doping concentration ( x = 0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.04). Small nonlinear trend can be associated with K → Eu replacement except for Lu → Eu substitution. e Dependence of the average bond length of Lu, K1, and K2 in K 3LuSi 2O 7: xEu 2+ ( x = 0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.04)
